description: Master the fundamentals of HTML structure, tags, and attributes.

slides.title: Welcome to HTML Basics
slides.content:
# HTML Basics üåê

Welcome to the world of web development! **HTML** (HyperText Markup Language) is the standard markup language for documents designed to be displayed in a web browser.

## What you'll learn:
- **Tags & Elements** - The building blocks
- **Attributes** - Providing extra info
- **Structure** - The skeleton of a webpage

> üí° **Fun Fact:** HTML was invented by Tim Berners-Lee in 1991. The first version only had 18 tags!

slides.title: Summary
slides.content:
# You did it! üéâ

You've learned the core of HTML:

- ‚úÖ **Tags** start and end elements (`<tag>...</tag>`)
- ‚úÖ **Attributes** add info (`src`, `href`, `class`)
- ‚úÖ **Structure** requires `<html>`, `<head>`, and `<body>`
- ‚úÖ **Headings** (`h1`-`h6`) structure your content

> üöÄ **Next:** Learn how to create interactive **Forms**!
